tool_description: Foldseek is a bioinformatics tool used to extract and analyze structural sequence data from protein structures.

required_parameters.name: pdb_path
required_parameters.description: Path to the PDB file containing the protein structure data.

return_values.name: seq_dict
return_values.description: Dictionary of extracted structural sequences by chain ID. Each entry contains a tuple with the primary sequence, structural sequence, and a combined annotated sequence.
